title: Houdini and Halloween - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/23/19
itunes:title: Houdini and Halloween - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 10/23/19
description:
George Noory and paranormal researcher Professor Slim King discuss the work of Harry Houdini who hoped to prove there was life after death, as well as Halloween traditions around the world and how to communicate with dead spirits.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
